com.se.simplicity.picking
Class Pick

java.lang.Object
  com.se.simplicity.picking.Pick

public class Pick
extends java.lang.Object

The position and area for a Picker to pick. A Pick generally represents a subset of a Camera's frame.

Author:
Gary Buyn
